languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! Полагаю, вы уже получили отчет о причастности исповедника Адальберта к деяниям Немезита? Недолго изменнику осталось осквернять своим присутствием стены святилища — мы готовы арестовать его, как только вы дадите свое высокое дозволение".
languages.translation_comment: если активен Obj_ArrestConfessor из Q1 Кибеллы

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан! Полагаю, вы уже получили отчет о причастности исповедника Адальберта к деяниям Немезита? Недолго изменнику осталось осквернять своим присутствием стены святилища — мы готовы арестовать его, как только вы дадите свое высокое дозволение".

languages.translation_comment: если активен Obj_ArrestConfessor из Q1 Кибеллы

languages.text: "Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! Полагаю, вы уже получили отчет о причастности исповедника Адальберта к деяниям Немезита? Недолго изменнику осталось осквернять своим присутствием стены святилища — мы готовы арестовать его, как только вы дадите свое высокое дозволение".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Reverend Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
"Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Reverend Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
"Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Reverend Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
"Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Reverend Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
"Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Reverend Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
"Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
"Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
"Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Avez-vous reçu le rapport détaillant les liens entre le confesseur Adalbert et Némésite ? Nous n'attendons que votre ordre pour l'arrêter. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Avez-vous reçu le rapport détaillant les liens entre le révérend Adalbert et Némésite ? Nous n'attendons que votre ordre pour l'arrêter. »

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! Espero que ya haya recibido el informe sobre la involucración del confesor Adalbert con Nemesitio. Estamos listos para arrestarlo, solo necesitamos que nos dé permiso».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! Espero que ya haya recibido el informe sobre la involucración del reverendo Adalbert con Nemesitio. Estamos listos para arrestarlo, solo necesitamos que nos dé permiso».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！聴罪師アダルバートがネメサイトの件に関与していたという報告はもう受けていますでしょうか？許可をいただければ、すぐにでも彼を捕える準備は整っています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！アダルバート司祭がネメサイトの件に関与していたという報告はもう受けていますでしょうか？許可をいただければ、すぐにでも彼を捕える準備は整っています」

languages.text: “舰长大人！我相信您已经收到了告解神父阿达伯特与涅墨斯特同流合污的报告。只要您一声令下，我们就立刻将他逮捕。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！我相信您已经收到了阿达伯特牧师与涅墨斯特同流合污的报告。只要您一声令下，我们就立刻将他逮捕。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Ich nehme an, Ihr habt den Bericht über Konfessor Adalberts Verbindung zu Nemesit bereits erhalten? Wir sind bereit, ihn zu verhaften, sobald Ihr uns die Erlaubnis dazu erteilt."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Ich nehme an, Ihr habt den Bericht über Reverend Adalberts Verbindung zu Nemesit bereits erhalten? Wir sind bereit, ihn zu verhaften, sobald Ihr uns die Erlaubnis dazu erteilt."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert'in Nemezit'le ilişkisine dair raporları aldığınızı tahmin ediyorum. Siz yüksek izninizi bahşeder bahşetmez onu tutuklamaya hazırız."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! I trust you have already received the report of Confessor Adalbert's involvement with Nemesite? We stand ready to arrest him as soon as you grant us your high permission to do so."
